content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. The location is ideal as it's close to all important facilities like the supermarket and public transportation. Now, let's talk about the rental price. I'm looking for a fair price, so feel free to make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for the offer, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate the central location and the proximity to amenities. I'm a student, so I'm looking for a place that's not only comfortable but also within my budget. Would you be willing to negotiate the price a bit?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Of course, Emilia. I'm always open to negotiations. I understand that you're a student and you're on a budget. But you have to understand that the location of this apartment is prime, and the facilities are top-notch. So, I'm willing to hear your offer, but I can't guarantee that I'll accept it. Please, make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'd like to offer 650 Euros per month, Mister Schmidt. I believe this is a fair price considering the size and location of the apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, 650 Euros per month is a low offer. While I appreciate your interest in the apartment, I can't accept that price. My apartment is in high demand, and I'm sure I can find a tenant who is willing to pay a fair price for such a prime location. Please, make a better offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Schmidt. How about 700 Euros per month? This is a good compromise between your asking price and my budget. I'm sure with the right furnishings, this place could be both comfortable and affordable for me.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, 700 Euros per month is still not enough for my apartment. I'm not opposed to negotiation, but you have to understand the value of my apartment. The location, the facilities, the size, everything is top-notch. I'm sure you understand that a fair price for such an apartment would be much higher than your offer. Please, make a better offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your time, Mister Schmidt. I'm sorry, but I'm not able to increase my offer significantly. If you're not comfortable with 700 Euros per month, I respect your decision. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe we are not aligned on the fair market price for this apartment. TERMINATE
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
